home.name: I'm Iveth
about.title: ABOUT ME
about.p1: Driven by a relentless passion for coding and technology, I thrive on crafting seamless digital experiences and solving complex problems as a Full Stack Developer. With a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies, I specialize in creating robust web applications that push boundaries and deliver exceptional user experiences.
about.p2: In my journey as a Full Stack Developer, I've embraced challenges, fostering innovation and efficiency through my code. I believe in the power of technology to transform ideas into reality and constantly seek opportunities to expand my skills and knowledge in the ever-evolving tech landscape.
about.p3: When I'm not immersed in lines of code, I'm an adventurer at heart, exploring the world of coding languages and frameworks with the same enthusiasm I bring to exploring new places. Whether it's optimizing algorithms or discovering hidden gems during my travels, I approach every endeavor with curiosity and determination.
profile.edu3: Responsive web design / javascript / front end libraries
profile.Hb3: Long walks to think and talk
profile.Hb4: my fav: Spend time with family and friends
portfolio.desc1: Responsive landing page ReactJs /  TailwindCss nodemailer
portfolio.desc2: Website showcase for private chef services, targeting an international audience, hence bilingual in English/Spanish with features aimed at elegantly showcasing the product and service, along with subtle calls to action.
portfolio.desc3: Complete online store for wholesale beauty products and items, featuring a catalog with filters and search, shopping cart, favorites, local state for guest users, dashboards for admin, superadmin, and buyers with specific functionalities. Includes Mercado Pago payment gateway, comprehensive inventory management by product attributes, seasonal, code-based, or product-specific discounts, review system, and abandoned cart reminders.
portfolio.desc4: Single page App consuming API, render and create functions JS/React/NodeJs/express
portfolio.desc5: SPA using the PERN stack, CRUD functionalities via HTTP, and authentication/authorization for admin with Auth0
portfolio.desc6: Website complete for selling electronic event invitations, the store features a catalog and a personalized ordering system with a requirements form. The admin dashboard is focused on modifying the catalog, and it also includes an order notification system.
portfolio.desc7: Styled and animated landing page with features managed via a login-enabled dashboard.
portfolio.descCurrent: Multilingual App SPA CRUD PERN to manage customer orders with different profiles

blog.pMain: This text would be a single-line introduction
blog.p1: Die Verwendung von Lorem Ipsum als Platzhaltertext ist in der Grafik- und Webdesignbranche weit verbreitet. Es hilft Designern und Entwicklern, eine Vorstellung davon zu bekommen, wie der endgültige Text in einem bestimmten Layout aussehen würde.
